features: IMPROVED SYMPTOMS: Well-tolerated formula, helps improve symptoms of food allergies and other GI conditions
SUPPORTS GROWTH: Complete nutrition specially formulated to help growth & development in infants
AMINO ACID-BASED FORMULA: Made with 100% free amino acids as the protein source for infants who cannot tolerate intact or hydrolyzed protein

body.description: EleCare is a nutritionally complete amino acid-based formula for infants who cannot tolerate intact or hydrolyzed protein. It’s hypoallergenic and clinically shown to support the growth of exclusively formula-fed infants. Has 100% free amino acids as the protein source, and has DHA and ARA to help support brain and eye development. EleCare helps improve symptoms of food allergies and various gastrointestinal (GI) conditions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A Well-tolerated, Amino Acid-based Formula EleCare is clinically shown to help improve symptoms of food allergies and other GI conditions. It’s a hypoallergenic formula that is clinically shown to be well-tolerated by infants who cannot tolerate intact or hydrolyzed protein. Clear Evidence for Growth Specially formulated nutrition to support your infant’s growth and development. EleCare is clinically shown to support growth in infants when used as a primary source of nutrition. And it has DHA and ARA—nutrients that help support brain and eye development. Navigating Reimbursement Get information on insurance and reimbursement assistance through the Pathway Plus website. How it works: Step 1. Call with insurance and prescriber information; Step 2. Pathway Plus helps determine coverage options; Step 3. Product can be delivered right to your door. Mixing Instructions To make approximately 2 fl oz of formula, pour 2 ounces of water into a clean bottle and add 1 unpacked level scoop (9.4g). Cap bottle and shake well. For approximately 4 fl oz of formula, use 4 ounces of water and 2 scoops (18.8g) of EleCare. After feeding begins, use within 1 hour or discard.
EleCare EleCare Jr Ages 0-12 months 1 year & older Complete Nutrition ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ 100% free amino acids as protein source ✓ ✓ Percent MCTs 33% 33% Flavors Unflavored Unflavored, Vanilla

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The only formula my grandson could use. It was so hard to find, but Amazon came through.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars why is it so expensive?
reviews.reviewText: I was shocked by the price on this. It seemed like an average formula. I tried it out because a lot of formulas are hard for my baby and she gets tummy problems. She didn't seem to have any problems with this one. She seemed a little wary about the taste at first. We mixed it with a bit of whole milk and after that she was fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only milk to buy!
reviews.reviewText: This formula works well! We have tried everything, but nothing seems to work until we came across this baby formula. Our little princess is allergic to almost everything. This is a bit on the pricey side, but worth every penny. This is also a bit hard to find in stores, so I've recommended this to other mothers as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a dr.
reviews.reviewText: I am not a Dr. And I'm not gonna tell you what you should/should not feed your baby. But this formula is comparable to top brands with its ingredients and the % of vitamins and such. It smells and looks the same as most major brands also. My baby had zero problems when wr switched her to this formula.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for a coworker who's child in on Nutramigen but she told me she already tried this one and it makes her little one gassy. So I tried it with my 5 months old who is partially breastfeed and partially feed with Aussie Bubs formula, and my baby tolerated this very well. But I need to mention that my baby have no allergies and has already tried few different formulas with no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you need a formula that is hypoallergenic or to deal with formula allergies, this one works well. While the taste isn't great, it works for those with severe allergies to lactose or other ingredients normally found in milk or other formulas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Has a delightful and scrumptious taste of burnt tar
reviews.reviewText: I can only assume that this can of EleCare has been sitting in Amazon's warehouse in Houston all summer where temperatures have reached 110 degrees. Since this is a widely sold food for babies, it could not have come out of Abbott's factory tasting like burnt tar, otherwise Abbott would soon be out of business.AMAZON, IF YOU ARE READING THIS, ANY AMINO ACID BASED FOOD ITEM MUST BE STORED IN A TEMPERTURE CONTROLLED WAREHOUSE OF NO WARMER THAN THE LOW SEVENTIES.
